text: (in kaafiron se kehdo) “agar tum faisla chahte thay to lo , faisla tumhare samne aa gaya. Ab baaz aa jao to tumhare hi liye behtar hai. Warna phir palat kar usi himakat ka iaada karogey to hum bhi isi saza ka iaada karenge aur tumhari jamiat, khwa woh kitni hi zyada ho, tumhare kuch kaam na aa sakegi. Allah momino ke saath hai”
